body_text: On the other hand, we do have to add AboutStudiesProtocol.jsm and any other modules we add to this list of modules to unload.
body: On the other hand, we *do* have to add `AboutStudiesProtocol.jsm` and any other modules we add to this list of modules to unload.
body_html: On the other hand, we do have to add AboutStudiesProtocol.jsm and any other modules we add to this list of modules to unload.
